abstract: The company will pay $70 million to settle a complaint that it paid bribes and kickbacks to win business overseas.
snippet: The company will pay $70 million to settle a complaint that it paid bribes and kickbacks to win business overseas.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — A wide-ranging government investigation of corrupt overseas marketing practices by drug and device makers scored its first major victory Friday when Johnson & Johnson admitted bribing European doctors and agreed to pay $70 million in civil and criminal fines.

headline.main: Johnson & Johnson Settles Bribery Complaint for $70 Million in Fines
headline.print_headline: Johnson & Johnson Settles Bribery Complaint for $70 Million in Fines
